attributes.action: Call for a National Investigation into Grooming Rape Gangs in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
Grooming gangs, often involving child exploitation, have been reported in several UK cities. These criminal gangs have been responsible for widespread abuse and exploitation of young people. Despite the seriousness of the issue, there has been inconsistency in how investigations are conducted and how perpetrators are prosecuted. 
To identify systemic failures and ensure that those responsible for these crimes are brought to justice."
attributes.background:
Launching a national investigation into grooming rape gangs.

Reviewing police responses and legal procedures around grooming rape cases.

Holding accountable those institutions, authorities or individuals  who failed to act.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
